article.title: Quote 2
article.description: In this article I have collected all those articles in case you have missed some of them over the years.
article.author: Sajra Muratovic

article.title: Quote 3
article.description: Take rest; a field that has rested gives a bountiful crop.”
article.author: Samed Muratovic

article.title: Sarajevo
article.description: Sarajevo je najljepsi grad na svijetu.
article.author: Azra Muratovic

article.title: Sajrica
article.description: Sajrica je bas slatka cura. I ovo je najbolji clanak, jer je u pitanju najbolja cura.
article.author: Amra Mujcinovic

article.title: Zimska snizenja
article.description: Jedva cekam da idem u shoping i da kupim sebi puno puno stvari. Glava me boli.
article.author: Sajraaaaaaaa

article.title: Da li znas
article.description: Kako zelim da te nadjem? Da li znas sto treba da znas?
article.author: Ekatarina Velika

article.title: Mala garava
article.description: Hocu jednu malu garavu, crnu kao braca Arapi...
article.author: Djordje Balasevic
